name: Fat People Faktori
description:
The absolute best game in it's genre! This game is engineer tf2 approved.

You are a brave entrepreneur that wants to make a living by synthesizing fat people out of thin air and whipping each one so they fart, then collecting those and selling them to power plants. Then using the money to power his factory beginning the vicious cycle anew!

v2 added music :

The music has reverb and low pass and slowed speed.

Olde Timey
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b...

GREAT NEWS :  I managed to export this to android, only tested on android 10.

Controls : use your mouse to click on the generator and click on the fat people too
